name: Death Knight
description: A fallen paladin corrupted by dark powers. Commands death magic and wields a massive runeblade infused with unholy energy.

abilities.name: Death Coil
abilities.description: Fires a bolt of death energy that damages enemies or heals undead units.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.description: Sacrifices a friendly undead unit to restore health.

abilities.name: Unholy Aura
abilities.description: Increases movement speed and life regeneration of nearby friendly units.

abilities.name: Animate Dead
abilities.description: Raises nearby corpses as invulnerable undead servants for a short time.
